message.body: I just finished your mom's book! I loved it! I feel like I know so much about your family now. For instance, I didn't know your uncle converted to Islam!

Rachel this is the nicest text ever. I love you and miss you. I'm really sad I can't be with you guys this weekend. Please have a link cocktail at pod for me. Or one of those amazing saki mojitos or rock shrimp !!!!!!!!!!!!!
All of the above! Done and done. We miss you too! :-(
Have Ellen cc me on some of the drunk videos she sends to Patrick
